hero.tagline: The ultimate destination for automotive enthusiasts. Join our community across all platforms for the latest content, event coverage, and passionate car discussions.

platform.heading: Follow Us Everywhere
platform.subheading: Stay connected with AUTODEBATE across all platforms. Never miss the latest automotive content, live streams, and community discussions.
platform.newsletterDesc: Get notified about new content, upcoming events, and exclusive community access.

gallery.heading: Event Photography Gallery
gallery.subheading: Capturing the essence of automotive culture. Download high-quality photos from every event we cover, completely free for our community.

features.freeDesc: All photos are available for free download in high resolution for our community members.
features.qualityDesc: Professional automotive photography captured with premium equipment at every event.
features.updatesDesc: New galleries added after every event we cover. Never miss a moment of automotive excellence.

blog.pageDescription: Read articles and news from the automotive world at AUTODEBATE. Opinion, reviews and automotive culture.
blog.heading: Automotive Insights & Discussions
blog.subheading: Discover the latest trends, deep analysis and fascinating stories from the automotive world
blog.newsletterDesc: Get the latest automotive insights delivered to your inbox.
blog.title: Title
blog.uploadText: Click to upload or drag and drop
blog.noPostsDesc: Stay tuned for exciting automotive content!

events.heading: Automotive Events Calendar
events.subheading: Stay updated with upcoming automotive events, our live streams, and meetups. Never miss a moment of automotive excellence.
events.ctaDesc: Planning an automotive event? We'd love to provide coverage and connect with the community.

about.pageDescription: Meet the AUTODEBATE team: honest content, community and passion for motorsports. Join us.
about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a team passionate about the automotive world, dedicated to creating authentic content and building the largest automotive community in the Hispanic world.
about.missionDesc: Inform, entertain and connect motor enthusiasts with exclusive coverage, deep debates and quality resources.
about.passionDesc: We live and breathe engines. Every content we create is born from our genuine passion for automotive culture.
about.whatWeDoDesc: We cover the automotive world from every possible angle
about.eventsDesc: Exclusive coverage of the best automotive events
about.reviewsDesc: Honest analysis of vehicles and products
about.contentDesc: Premium quality videos, articles and podcasts
about.workWithUsDesc: We are always looking for talent passionate about the automotive world. If you share our vision and want to be part of the AUTODEBATE team, we would love to meet you.
about.stayInTouchDesc: Do you have any questions, suggestions or just want to say hello? Don't hesitate to write to us.

auth.loginDescription: Log in to your AUTODEBATE account to access the community and events.
auth.signupDescription: Create your AUTODEBATE account to join the community and events.
auth.signupSubtitle: Sign up with your email and a password.
